basics.summary: I am a scientist from Mexico working on Data Science projects while searching for a new professional opportunity. Currently I am a validation specialist and author at @Knotion; also a dubbing audio operator at @KoeDubbingMastersMexico

work.summary: Leverage agile frameworks to provide a robust synopsis for high level overviews. Iterative approaches to corporate strategy foster collaborative thinking to further the overall value proposition. Organically grow the holistic world view of disruptive innovation via workplace diversity and empowerment.
highlights: Dealt with Elastical Gomez on a daily basis.

publications.name: Radio Julius
publications.summary: Capitalize on low hanging fruit to identify a ballpark value added activity to beta test.

references.name: Nannette Nananacci
references.reference: It is my pleasure to recommend Dugan Nash, his performance working as a consultant for Main St. Company proved that he will be a valuable addition to any company.
